tool_description:
Update: 31 May 2023: API is fixed & it is now 100% working.  Now suports Youtu.be links
-A new endpoint added that downloads YT mp3 in best audio quality: 320Kbps, 128Kbps, 192Kbps, 256Kbps & 64Kbps.
Download any Youtube Video in Mp3 Format (No ads, no wild redirects, only mp3 files)
name: YouTube Mp3 Downloader
title: YouTube Mp3 Downloader

api_list.name: Download mp3 (custom audio quality)
api_list.description: Download YouTube to Mp3 in various audio quality: 320 Kbps, 192Kbps, 256Kbps, 128Kbps & 64Kbps. (Specify the quality in the field)

required_parameters.name: quality
required_parameters.description:
Select the audio quality of the output mp3. Allowed values are:
320
192
256
128
64

test_endpoint.messages: The request to the API has timed out. Please try again later, or if the issue persists, please contact the API provider
test_endpoint.info: Your Client (working) ---> Gateway (working) ---> API (took too long to respond)

api_list.name: Download YouTube Mp3
api_list.description: Update: 17 May 2023: API is fixed & it is now 100% working. Converts any YouTube video into Mp3 downloadable files. No Ads. No wild redirects.
